column5: Enjoy a visit to our retirement community located in Georgetown, TX, the number one retirement community located near Austin. Visit family & sightsee in Austin and Hill Country while you have the comfort of a beautifully furnished home. Walk the trails, golf at 3 luxury courses, enjoy the amenities and lifestyle of our senior community. The home is beautifully furnished, comfortable beds, well appointed kitchen, 3 flat screen TV's and up to date wi-fi services. Garage and covered patio.
column8: Fully furnished home in SUN CITY, TEXAS
